QuestData.Title: Dark Horizon
QuestData.Description: Ahh, another supplicant answerin' da Lich King's call.$b$b<Drakuru sniffs you.>$b$bFreshly scourged, eh? Ya still be reekin' of da living!$b$bLong be da line of dem who seek da Lich King's blessings. Ya must rise above da masses and prove yerself worthy of wieldin' true power.$b$bLookin' down over Zul'Drak, I sensed potential in ya. I ordered your - invitation.$b$bDa rest be up ta you....$b$bGo an' speak ta Gorebag for a tour of Zul'Drak. Dere be much ta do if you're to be of any worth to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru in Voltarus wants you to speak to Gorebag and take the tour of Zul'Drak.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have ya taken in da battlefield yet, mon?
QuestData.RewardText: So, now ya be seein' what we be up against, mon.$b$bI want ya ta go down, learn da land, mingle with yer brethren. Prepare yourself...$b$bSoon, dere be much for ya to do. Don't ya be disappointin' me!
